body_html:
The current counter-intuitive behavior is that there's no way to include the endpoints of your walks if you use a tensor

IE the following will not include A0 in the forward walks returned

print(ge.get_forward_walk_ops(A0, inclusive=True))
body_text:
The current counter-intuitive behavior is that there's no way to include the endpoints of your walks if you use a tensor
IE the following will not include A0 in the forward walks returned
print(ge.get_forward_walk_ops(A0, inclusive=True))
body:
The current counter-intuitive behavior is that there's no way to include the endpoints of your walks if you use a tensor

IE the following will not include `A0` in the forward walks returned

`print(ge.get_forward_walk_ops(A0, inclusive=True))`
